title: Renai Club
sinopse:
"Everytime he teases me, my body aches for him.
Why am I reacting to his touch?
Don't tell me that I...
We realized our feelings when our bodies were one.
I came to know what 'climax' is or the first time.
When I had figured out that I'm falling for you, you had already joined the Renai Club."

(Source: Covenant of Darkness & Fate)
